snippet: CHAZAN--Libby, January 31, 2016, in Montreal. Beloved wife of the late Aaron, z"l. Devoted mother of Cindy (Jay Leipzig) and Corinne (Michel Lalonde) and dear Bubby of Marshal, and Edina (Maor) Chazan-Lavigne, and Eric and Deborah Leipzig; sister- in-law of Dorothy Hertzman of Rehovot, Israel. Funeral at Paperman's Montreal, February 2, 2pm. Shiva 10 Smith Manor Blvd., #
